abstract: MTLFunctionHandle  gpuResourceID Instance PropertygpuResourceIDiOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+var gpuResourceID: MTLResourceID { get }Required
overview:
MTLFunctionHandle  gpuResourceID Instance PropertygpuResourceIDiOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+var gpuResourceID: MTLResourceID { get }Required

Handle of the GPU resource suitable for storing in an Intersection Function Buffer.

The handle must have been created from an intersection function annotated with the intersection_function_buffer tag.

-  gpuResourceID 

Instance Property# gpuResourceID

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
var gpuResourceID: MTLResourceID { get }
```

**Required**

## [Discussion](/documentation/Metal/MTLFunctionHandle/gpuResourceID#discussion)

Handle of the GPU resource suitable for storing in an Intersection Function Buffer.

The handle must have been created from an intersection function annotated with the `intersection_function_buffer` tag.
